description: This game was pretty decent for what it is. Very well made, loads of content, and the multiplayer is spot on!
Toss a coin to your witcher, o vally o plenty....
Who seriously plays these types of games? Why on earth would we promote running people over with cars and firing rocket launchers off of skyscrapers? THINK OF THE CHILDREN!!!
I found the puzzles to be phenomenal but the story was lackluster. Worth a playthrough, nothing more.
Traditionally this game really isn't my style, but it was very well made. Rockstar really hit the nail on the head with this one!
I LOVE LOOTER SHOOTERS AND THIS IS NO EXCEPTION TO THAT STATEMENT!!!! 10/10 MUST PLAY!!!
